ext_byteorder.h

00001 #ifndef _BYTEORDER_H_
00002 #define _BYTEORDER_H_
00003 
00004 #ifdef WIN_VERSION
00005 #define LITTLE_ENDIAN
00006 #else
00007 #define BIG_ENDIAN 
00008 #endif
00009 
00010 #define BYTEORDER_SWAPW16(x) ((short)(((((unsigned short)(x))>>8)&0x00ff)+((((unsigned short)(x))<<8)&0xff00)))
00011 #define BYTEORDER_SWAPW32(x) ((long)(((((unsigned long)(x))>>24L)&0x000000ff)+((((unsigned long)(x))>>8L)&0x0000ff00)+ \
00012                                     ((((unsigned long)(x))<<24L)&0xff000000)+((((unsigned long)(x))<<8L)&0x00ff0000)))
00013 #define BYTEORDER_SWAPF32 byteorder_swapf32
00014 #define BYTEORDER_SWAPF64 byteorder_swapf64
00015 
00016 #ifdef BIG_ENDIAN
00017 #define BYTEORDER_LSBW16(x)         BYTEORDER_SWAPW16(x)
00018 #define BYTEORDER_LSBW32(x)         BYTEORDER_SWAPW32(x)
00019 #define BYTEORDER_LSBF32(x)         BYTEORDER_SWAPF32(x)
00020 #define BYTEORDER_LSBF64(x)         BYTEORDER_SWAPF64(x)
00021 #define BYTEORDER_MSBW16(x)         (x)
00022 #define BYTEORDER_MSBW32(x)         (x)
00023 #define BYTEORDER_MSBF32(x)         (x)
00024 #define BYTEORDER_MSBF64(x)         (x)
00025 #else
00026 #define BYTEORDER_LSBW16(x)         (x)
00027 #define BYTEORDER_LSBW32(x)         (x)
00028 #define BYTEORDER_LSBF32(x)         (x)
00029 #define BYTEORDER_LSBF64(x)         (x)
00030 #define BYTEORDER_MSBW16(x)         BYTEORDER_SWAPW16(x)
00031 #define BYTEORDER_MSBW32(x)         BYTEORDER_SWAPW32(x)
00032 #define BYTEORDER_MSBF32(x)         BYTEORDER_SWAPF32(x)
00033 #define BYTEORDER_MSBF64(x)         BYTEORDER_SWAPF64(x)
00034 #endif
00035 
00036 #endif // _BYTEORDER_H
